**** PLEASE DO NOT EDIT ****

Images

`I` (
    I       BINARY(64)      UNIQUE                                          COMMENT 'Image sha512 hash Identifier',
    CDT     DATETIME                DEFAULT NOW()                           COMMENT 'Image Creation Date and Time',
    ACL     BIGINT UNSIGNED         DEFAULT 4294967295                      COMMENT 'Image Access Clearance Level',
    MT      VARCHAR(255)			DEFAULT 'text/plain'                    COMMENT 'Image Mime Type',
    CI      BIGINT UNSIGNED                                                 COMMENT 'Image Creator Identifier',
    PRIMARY KEY(I),
    KEY ACLK (ACL),
    CONSTRAINT UFK          FOREIGN KEY (CI)                REFERENCES U(I) COMMENT 'Image User Foreign Key'
) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci

ENGINE = InnoDB
